Description: Saudi Telecom (known as: STC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 2003. STC operates within the Telecommunication Services sector focusing on Integrated Telecommunication Services. It has Companies operating across Southeast Asia and Middle East. STC is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 1998.
